---
title: "R stacking lines"
output: html_notebook
---



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
infldata <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flynnecon/datavizf25/refs/heads/main/data/infldata.csv")
infldata$year <- year(mdy(infldata$date))
infldata$month <- month(mdy(infldata$date))
ggplot(infldata,aes(x=month,y=expinfl,group=year)) + geom_line()
```
